description: Data was generated from an older CCLE dataset from Google Genomics on February 2016. Expression data was generated using Raw Affymetrix U133+2 CEL files that was converted to a single value for each probe set using Robust Multi-array Average (RMA) and quantile normalization.

fields.description: Cell line primary name, appended with a short name for the location  of the cancer; e.g. TC71_BONE, HUPT4_PANCREAS, etc
fields.name: CCLE_name

fields.description: The cell line primary name; e.g. TC-71, NIH:OVCAR-3, etc
fields.name: Cell_line_primary_name

fields.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is the NCBI gene ID e.g. 100506168
fields.name: gene_id

fields.description: HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee gene symbol, based on gene_id in original data file, eg AMY1A. Null if no gene symbol could be found
fields.name: HGNC_gene_symbol

fields.description: Gene symbol from the original data file, differs if the approved gene symbol has since changed, eg C11orf17 became AKIP1
fields.name: original_gene_symbol

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (Genome_Wide_SNP_6)
fields.name: Platform

fields.description: RMA (Robust Multi-array Average) is an algorithm used to create an expression matrix from Affymetrix data. The raw intensity values are background corrected, log2 transformed and then quantile normalized. Next a linear model is fit to the normalized data to obtain an expression measure for each probe set on each array. More information can be found here: Irizarry, RA et al. Exploration, Normalization, and Summaries of High Density Oligonucleotide Array Probe Level Data. Biostatistics 2003
fields.name: RMA_normalized_expression
